abstract: JPMorgan Chase has hired Jane Garvey, a former head of the Federal Aviation Administration, as its new head of transportation infrastructure investment practice, the bank said Monday in an internal memorandum obtained by DealBook.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase has hired Jane Garvey, a former head of the Federal Aviation Administration, as its new head of transportation infrastructure investment practice, the bank said Monday in an internal memorandum obtained by DealBook.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase has hired Jane Garvey, a former head of the Federal Aviation Administration, as its new head of transportation infrastructure investment practice, the bank said Monday in an internal memorandum obtained by DealBook.

headline.main: JPMorgan Hires Ex-F.A.A. Head for Infrastructure Team
